title: Newcastle and Stella Artois beer logos
content:
hey all, looking for fonts similar to both the newcastle brown ale and stella artois typefaces...the caps used in the main brand text.

any help is appreciated. thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Deckel_StellaArtois01_1_4577.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newcastlewoodsign_6108.jpg)
author: staybeautiful

comments.content:
For Newcastle - look at AlphDog

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tailspinstudio/alph-dog/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tailspinstudio/alph-dog/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tailspinstudio/alph-dog/")

Agora

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/agora-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/agora-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/agora-bq/")

Memo Bold (this one may be closest)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/memo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/memo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/memo/")

For Stella check out

Flange - [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/flange-bq/")

Dragon - [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dragon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011132343/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dragon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dragon/")
